name: Mismeme 谬因
body:
### What's meme?
A meme  is "an idea, behavior, or style that spreads from person to person within a culture". A meme acts as a unit for carrying cultural ideas, symbols, or practices that can be transmitted from one mind to another through writing, speech, gestures, rituals, or other imitable phenomena with a mimicked theme. Supporters of the concept regard memes as cultural analogues to genes in that they self-replicate, mutate, and respond to selective pressures.[[1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meme)]

### What's mismeme?
A wrong, mistaken, harmful meme.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
